other_title: おおきく振りかぶって (Japanese)
王牌投手 振臂高揮 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: The series, set in Saitama, follows Ren Mihashi, who had previously excelled as his middle school baseball team's ace pitcher, due to his grandfather's connections as its manager. As he graduates to high school, whose baseball team his grandfather does not manage, he initially does not believe he is good enough to succeed at baseball, however, but assisted by his friends, he grows in stature, confidence and skill, helping his team excel with his own ability.
opening_theme: "Dramatic (ドラマチック)" by Base Ball Bear (eps 1-13)
ending_theme: "Medaka no Mita Niji (メダカの見た虹)" by Kozue Takada (eps 1-13)
